Tours & Pricing

Choose your perfect Seattle layover adventure

6-Hour Classic Tour

Pike Place & Waterfront

Includes airport meet-up, round-trip city transfers, and a Seattle chocolate cherry gift bag.

Discover Seattle's heartbeat in just six hours. Explore Pike Place Market, watch the famous fish toss, snap photos at the Gum Wall, browse artisan shops, and stroll the waterfront — all with a friendly local guide.

✔Pike Place Market tour
✔Famous fish toss viewing
✔Waterfront exploration
✔Local guide expertise

7-Hour Extended Tour

Classic + Space Needle

All Classic features plus Space Needle visit

Everything in the Classic Tour plus a quick Space Needle photo stop. Perfect for travelers who want both insider gems and Seattle's most iconic landmark.

✔All Classic Tour features
✔Space Needle photo stop
✔Extended exploration time
✔Seattle's iconic landmark

8-Hour Premium Tour

Extended + Kerry Park

Maximum Seattle experience with skyline views

The ultimate layover adventure. Includes everything in the Extended Tour, plus a stop at Kerry Park for Seattle's postcard skyline view.

✔All Extended Tour features
✔Kerry Park skyline views
✔Postcard-perfect photos
✔Ultimate Seattle experience

Cancellation Policy

Free cancellation up to 24 hours before your tour. No hidden fees.

Note: Each tour is a 6-hour total experience, including airport pickup, guided sightseeing, and a guaranteed on-time return with a 2-hour flight buffer.
